location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, communicating that the Governor in Council cannot allow to the Resident any commission on a silk purchase, whose details are enclosed.In enclosure letter dated 29 May, sent from the Export Warehouse Keeper at Bombay, George V Drury, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, containing an invoice for fifty bales of Ghelan [Gilan] silk imported from Bushire signed on the same date by Drury.
